column5: WAS A GOOD DAY FOR EVERYONE YESTERDAY!! WATERS WERE DIRTY AT FIRST BUT GOT BETTER AS THE DAY WENT ON!!! DID WELL AND HERES A FEW PICS FROM THE DAY!!! WISH I GOT A BETTER PIC OF NUMBER4 (APPROX 15LB FAT HEN) MAN SHE WAS BIG!!!  WELL THERES ALWAYS TOMOR!!!
Man...I'm sooo jealous!!!  I just posted my skunk report....LOL.  I'm new to the trib thing...hoping to end the skunk soon!!  Congrats...those are beautiful fish you pulled out there!!!
Nice work CC!  Awesome pics as always.
wtg CC, maybe i'll see you out in the east tomorrow if you're around(?) you done working for the winter or just shut down for a bit?
DONE FOR THE WINTER FOR NOW  LOL!!  TOMOR SHOULD BE A GOOD DAY!!! HOPE I CAN GET OUT  LOL
Nice work Scot !  I am really hoping to get out that way sometime this week ... maybe tomorrow
Man u have sweet days have u ever got skunked because when ever i read your reports u always have fish. Thats not a bad thing u r pro. Man u got some big fish there    jordan
the pros dont post when they get skunked
amazing, as always CC  It seems like I work everytime we get a rain. ANd I get to fish when its crystal clear.  one day...
i got my day of skunk too fella !!! not often though!!! sometimes i have to hit 3 or 4 creeks so i dont!!! always lots of footwork invovled
